Negative_Energy_Arrows.NAME: Negative Energy Arrows
Negative_Energy_Arrows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply !M! NegativeLevel.

Thousand_Bone_Knives.NAME: Thousand Bone Knives
Thousand_Bone_Knives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL If you have Bones : NL Hit 1 additional time. Remove 1 Bones.

Shade_Step.NAME: Shade Step
Shade_Step.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If that card(s) is a Skill : NL Gain 1 Energy.

Bone_Armor.NAME: Bone Armor
Bone_Armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 Bones. NL Gain 1 Artifact.

Bone_Armory.NAME: Bone Armory
Bone_Armory.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn : Gain 1 Bones.

Bone_Spikes.NAME: Bone Spikes
Bone_Spikes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If you have Bones : Deal 4 additional Damage. Remove 1 Bones.

Negative_Energy_Bomb.NAME: Negative Energy Bomb
Negative_Energy_Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Remove all NegativeLevels. NL Deal 6 damage for each stack of NegativeLevel removed to ALL enemies.

Blood_for_Blood.NAME: Blood for Blood
Blood_for_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP : Gain 1 Blood.

Blood_Shield.NAME: Blood Shield
Blood_Shield.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 blood

Vampiric_Strike.NAME: Vampiric Strike
Vampiric_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If target was above 50% HP : Heal for 25% damage dealt.

Summon_Lich.NAME: Summon Lich
Summon_Lich.DESCRIPTION: Summon a powerful undead Mage that deals !M! damage to ALL enemies each turn.

Summon_Vampire_Lady.NAME: Summon Lich
Summon_Vampire_Lady.DESCRIPTION: Summon a Vampire that deals6 damage to a random enemy each turn and heals for 50% damage dealt.

Bone_Prison.NAME: Bone Prison
Bone_Prison.DESCRIPTION: If the target intends to attack : Stun it. Add 1 Bones. Exhaust.

Detonate_Bones.NAME: Detonate Bones
Detonate_Bones.DESCRIPTION: Remove all bones. Deal !D! damage times the amount of stacks removed.

Negative_Energy_Mist.NAME: Negative Energy Mist
Negative_Energy_Mist.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 NegativeLevels to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

Consume_Illness.NAME: Consume Illness
Consume_Illness.DESCRIPTION: Remove a negative effect. If you do : Heal 3 HP. Exhaust.

Negative_Energy_Shield.NAME: Negative Energy Shield
Negative_Energy_Shield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain 1 Negative Energy Shield.

Uncharnel.NAME: Uncharnel
Uncharnel.DESCRIPTION: Add an exhausted card to your drawpile. Gain !M! Zombie (s). Exhaust.

Violent_Necrosis.NAME: Violent Necrosis
Violent_Necrosis.DESCRIPTION: Double all of the targets debuffs. Exhaust.

Corrupt.NAME: Corrupt Power
Corrupt.DESCRIPTION: Corrupt all non-unique buffs of the target. Exhaust.

Epidemic.NAME: Epidemic
Epidemic.DESCRIPTION: Spread all debuffs of the target to all enemies. Exhaust.

Toxic_Smoke_Screen.NAME: Toxic Smokescreen
Toxic_Smoke_Screen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. When attacked : Apply !M! Poison to the attacker.

Pandemic.NAME: Pandemic
Pandemic.DESCRIPTION: Apply 4 Poison and 2 Vulnerable to the target. Apply 2 Poison and 1 Vulnerable to ALL other enemies. Exhaust.

Siphon_Strength.NAME: Siphon Strength
Siphon_Strength.DESCRIPTION: Drain 2 Strength from the target. Exhaust.

Skeleton_Dragon.NAME: Summon Skeleton Dragon
Skeleton_Dragon.DESCRIPTION: Summon a SkeletonDragon. Costs 1 Energy less for each stack of Bones, consuming them.
